title: Engine Base
description: Base configuration schema which all engine configurations inherit from

EngineType.description: Engine type. Used by EngineLauncherManager to select the correct engine launcher

EngineProcessLauncher.title: Engine Process Launcher
EngineProcessLauncher.description: Process Launcher that will be used to launch the engine process

EngineCommandTimeout.description: Engine Timeout (in seconds). It tells how long to wait for the completion of the engine runStep. 0 or negative values are interpreted as no timeout
